## StringConverter class

The [StringConverter](./ts-utils.conversion.stringconverter.md) class extends [BaseConverter](./ts-utils.conversion.baseconverter.md) to provide string-specific helper methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class StringConverter<T extends string = string, TC = unknown> extends BaseConverter<T, TC> 
```
**Extends:** [BaseConverter](./ts-utils.conversion.baseconverter.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TC&gt;

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [matching(match, options)](./ts-utils.stringconverter.matching.md) |  | Returns a [StringConverter](./ts-utils.conversion.stringconverter.md) which constrains the result to match a supplied string. |
